content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. In the real world, many businesses have had to adapt to new ways of operating, such as offering delivery or curbside pickup, and transitioning to remote work. It remains to be seen how Walford will adapt, but hopefully the community can come together to support local businesses and help those who have lost their jobs due to the pandemic. Innovation and creativity will be crucial in finding solutions during this challenging time, and we hope that Walford can rise to the challenge.
